name: SCP-087 VR Survivor
description: Virtual Reality survival rogue-like game based on the SCP-087 lore. You are scientist from SCP foundation inside SCP-087. How long you can survive? Can you find the way out?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
